scripts.buildMonaco: npm run compile && npm run build -w monaco
scripts.buildVSCode: npm run compile && npm run packagePlugin -w vscode
scripts.buildPlugins: npm run buildMonaco && npm run buildVSCode
scripts.compile: npm run compile -w shared && npm run compile -w vscode
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.vscode: npm run compile && npm run vscode -w vscode
scripts.monaco: npm run compile && npm run dev -w monaco
